name: Pizza Hut
ingredients: For the dough: all-purpose flour, yeast, warm water, salt, sugar, olive oil. For the topping: pizza sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, your choice of toppings like pepperoni, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions.
instructions: Prepare the dough by combining warm water and yeast, then mix with flour, salt, sugar, and olive oil. Knead the dough and let it rise.
Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C). Roll out the dough and transfer it to a baking sheet.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the dough, then add shredded mozzarella cheese and your preferred toppings.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven, let it cool slightly, slice, and serve.
